Introduction

Ryeowon is a South Korean singer who was a member of the girl groups Blady and PRISM. She joined Blady and its subunit Blady Soul in 2013 and left in 2014. In 2016, she participated in the reality survival show Produce 101 and was eliminated in episode 5 finishing in 72nd place. In 2018, she debuted with PRISM under the stage name Ryeowon with their first single "Chok".
